about me

I’m a hard working and dedicated professional front-end developer with a keen eye for detail, and a determination to deliver the very highest quality. I take great pride in my work, and I always try to better myself with every project I work on. I like to write semantic, cross browser compatible code that is re-useable, maintainable and easy to understand.

I am motivated, enthusiastic and well organised, with a keen eye for beautiful design.
